name: Nightfall Noir
description: A smooth, dark, and silky composition blending amber warmth with refined tonka layers. Crafted for men who want a confident, mysterious aura that lasts through the night.

name: Wild Vertigo
tagline: Green aromatic notes with sharp pepper.
description: Bold, energetic, and modern—fresh green notes collide with a peppery twist to create a vibrant scent that fuels motion, ambition, and nonstop daytime confidence.

name: Sultan Smoke
description: A royal oud masterpiece infused with smoky depth and warm spices. Rich, dominant, and luxurious, it delivers a commanding masculine presence from the first spray.

name: Midnight Creed
tagline: Leather and musk with a noble edge.
description: A magnetic blend of refined leather and soft musk, designed to give a strong yet elegant masculine signature. Smooth, deep, and perfect for evening sophistication.

name: Royal Havana
description: Warm tobacco meets creamy vanilla and subtle spices, echoing the charm of Havana nights. A cozy, inviting masculine scent with a timeless gentleman vibe.

name: Black Voyager
tagline: Citrus freshness with dark woody finish.
description: A modern contrast of bright citrus opening notes fading into a bold woody base. Versatile, adventurous, and perfect for men who love dynamic everyday freshness.

name: Crystal Petals
description: A youthful floral blend with a bright, sweet sparkle that feels fresh and uplifting. Designed for cheerful, energetic women who love light, glowing scents.

name: Golden Amira
description: A luminous fusion of jasmine, honey, and warm amber that radiates richness. Elegant, royal, and designed to bring out the queen in every woman.

name: Rosalia Essence
description: A crisp and romantic rose bouquet uplifted with bright fruity accents. Feminine, delicate, and perfect for everyday softness with a modern twist.

name: Luminous Peony
description: An airy peony fragrance that blends fresh florals with soft radiance. Clean, light, and perfect for a daily elegant presence.

name: Fleur Royale
description: A luxurious white floral composition with deep, timeless elegance. Smooth, feminine, and crafted for women who love classic, sophisticated scents.

name: Blush Mirage
description: A dreamy fusion of peachy sweetness, soft florals, and airy musk. Gentle, warm, and ideal for creating a soft feminine aura.

name: Pink Aura
description: Playful strawberry notes wrapped in soft florals to create a joyful, sweet, and radiant feminine scent full of freshness and charm.

name: Urban Echo
description: A clean and modern blend of fresh woods and airy notes. Balanced and lightweight, ideal for both men and women who love minimalist scents.

name: Silver Bloom
description: A soft fusion of gentle florals and crisp musk to create a balanced unisex scent. Smooth, calming, and wearable anytime, anywhere.

name: Cedar Halo
description: Minimalistic and elegant, Cedar Halo blends clean cedarwood with soft musk to craft a cozy, universally appealing scent with modern simplicity.

name: Whisper Sand
description: A warm, soft blend of cozy notes designed to feel natural and effortless on anyone. Subtle, comforting, and perfect for everyday calm.

name: Cloud Oud
description: A clean and airy oud fragrance with gentle sweetness and modern softness. Light, elegant, and perfect for those who love subtle oud without heaviness.
